name: granny stitch bucket hat
notes:
this granny stitch bucket hat is a cute accessory that will help keep your head cool and shade your eyes this summer! a small and quick project, this hat will take less than a skein of yarn, or you can use your scraps to make a multicolored bucket hat. using the timeless granny stitch, this pattern creates a mesh bucket hat that is both fashionable and functional!

materials

* 80 grams of medium weight yarn (favorite cotton in “cream”)
* 5.5mm clover amour crochet hook
* scissors
* yarn needle

dimensions
*includes basic instructions to adjust sizing*
* overall: 33.5 centimeters wide x 20 centimeters long (13.2 x 7.9 inches)
* fits: 51 – 55 centimeters (20.1″ – 21.7″) circumference head
